Metadata.name: C3 Agent-Assisted Payment IVR
Metadata.description: Flow for collecting payments with C3 through a quick connect IVR.

Parameters.Text: There was a problem with your expiration date. Please try again.
There was a problem with your routing number. Please try again.
Are you still there?
Are you still there?
Are you still there?
Are you still there?
Please enter your card's expiration date, followed by the pound key when complete.
Please enter your bank's routing number, followed by the pound key when complete.
Your payment was processed successfully.
We're sorry, an error has occured that prevents us from collecting the payment.
A receipt has been sent to your email address at $.Attributes.['Email'].
There was an error sending the receipt to your email address at $.Attributes.['Email']. Please contact customer support to receive a receipt for this transaction.
We're sorry, an error has occured preventing us from submitting your payment. You have not been charged.
There was a problem validating your $.Attributes.PaymentMethod information.
Returning you to the agent...
There was an error creating the payment request.
There's no payment information for this contact. Please fill out the information in the C3 Payment Request app and try again.
There was an error placing the agent on hold. Unable to request payment.
To ensure the security of your information, the agent has been temporarily placed on hold.
A payment has been requested for the amount of $$.Attributes.PaymentAmount.
Your input was not recognized. Please try again.
Are you still there?
Please enter your card number followed by the pound key when complete.
Please enter your bank account number followed by the pound key when complete.
Are you still there?

To pay with a credit card, press 1.
To pay directly with your bank account, press 2.

You previously paid with a bank account.

If you would like to use this account again for this payment, press 1.
To use a different payment method, press 2.

You previously paid with a credit card.

If you would like to use this card again for this payment, press 1.
To use a different payment method, press 2.
